document_data.name: Ironhand's Arms
document_data.mainbody: '''Ironhand's Arms''' was a weapon shop in [[Highcastle]] that operated during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. They offered quality weapons at a fairly reasonable price, tacking on only a 10% markup on goods. The shop was run by [[Azan Stonesplitter]], a [[dwarven]] blacksmith.
